entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 36.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 36. Wind chill near minus 46. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 28.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High minus 28. Wind chill minus 46 in the morning and minus 38 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 23 by morning. POP 30%
